sub_fields.label: Fonts Loaded

sub_fields.instructions: Fonts to be loaded on website

sub_fields.label: Font upload
sub_fields.name: font_upload
sub_fields.instructions: Allowed file types: ttf, woff, woff2, eot, svg, otf
sub_fields.mime_types: ttf, woff, woff2, eot, svg, otf

sub_fields.label: Font family
sub_fields.name: font_family
sub_fields.instructions: If different from default. Example: 'MetropolisRegular', Arial, sans-serif

sub_fields.label: Letter spacing
sub_fields.name: letter_spacing
sub_fields.instructions: Accepts px, rem, em. Default is 0. Example: 0.1em

sub_fields.label: Heading Detail
sub_fields.name: heading_detail
sub_fields.instructions: Create a row for headings that are different from Headings default above.

sub_fields.label: Font family
sub_fields.name: font_family
sub_fields.instructions: If different from site or header default. Example: 'MetropolisRegular', Arial, sans-serif

sub_fields.label: Font Size
sub_fields.name: font_size
sub_fields.instructions: Highly recommend rem for responsive heading sizes. Handy tool: https://pixelsconverter.com/px-to-rem
